attributes.action: Amend The Human Rights Act To Stop Aiding and Abetting Terrorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Human Rights Act needs to be amended so that Terrorists cannot use this act against public wishes to further their stay in Great Britian in Prison or not..!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
